Title: Anna Howard Shaw Day
Plot: Liz schedules oral surgery in an effort to avoid Valentine's Day. Meanwhile, Jack falls for a sexy CNBC journalist, Avery Jessup (Elizabeth Banks), and Jenna is crushed to discover that her stalker (Horatio Sanz) has moved on.
GuestStars: Elizabeth Banks, Horatio Sanz, Jon Hamm, Jon Bon Jovi
